snippet.title: Steel Century Groove - Official Trailer |The MIX | Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description: Steel Century Groove is a rhythm-RPG where you pilot mecha in dance battles. Assemble a squad of colossal dancers, challenge every rival you lock eyes with, compete for the championship trophy, and uncover the secrets of a world where everything moves to the drumbeat of steel feet. Head over to Steam and add Steel Century Groove to your wishlist now!
